Explanation: Make everything a service. Assume your code will be consumed by a front-end client, gateway, or another service.

On a workstation, you have deep visibility into your application and its behavior. In the cloud, you donâ€™t. Make sure your design includes the collection of monitoring, domain-specific, and health/system data.
Implement identity from the start. Consider RBAC (role-based access control) features available in public clouds.
